channel.title: CVE Feed for MLflow -- MLflow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MLflow -- MLflow

item.title: CVE-2024-37058|2024-06-04T12:01:43.266Z -- MLflow -- MLflow
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data can occur in versions of the MLflow platform running version 2.5.0 or newer, enabling a maliciously uploaded Langchain AgentExecutor model to run arbitrary code on an end user’s system when interacted with.

item.title: CVE-2024-37060|2024-06-04T12:02:12.858Z -- MLflow -- MLflow
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data can occur in versions of the MLflow platform running version 1.27.0 or newer, enabling a maliciously crafted Recipe to execute arbitrary code on an end user’s system when run.

item.title: CVE-2024-37059|2024-06-04T12:01:58.728Z -- MLflow -- MLflow
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data can occur in versions of the MLflow platform running version 0.5.0 or newer, enabling a maliciously uploaded PyTorch model to run arbitrary code on an end user’s system when interacted with.

item.title: CVE-2024-37055|2024-06-04T12:00:51.438Z -- MLflow -- MLflow
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data can occur in versions of the MLflow platform running version 1.24.0 or newer, enabling a maliciously uploaded pmdarima model to run arbitrary code on an end user’s system when interacted with.

item.title: CVE-2024-37061|2024-06-04T12:02:23.269Z -- MLflow -- MLflow
item.description: Remote Code Execution can occur in versions of the MLflow platform running version 1.11.0 or newer, enabling a maliciously crafted MLproject to execute arbitrary code on an end user’s system when run.

item.title: CVE-2024-37057|2024-06-04T12:01:28.229Z -- MLflow -- MLflow
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data can occur in versions of the MLflow platform running version 2.0.0rc0 or newer, enabling a maliciously uploaded Tensorflow model to run arbitrary code on an end user’s system when interacted with.

item.title: CVE-2024-37056|2024-06-04T12:01:09.258Z -- MLflow -- MLflow
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data can occur in versions of the MLflow platform running version 1.23.0 or newer, enabling a maliciously uploaded LightGBM scikit-learn model to run arbitrary code on an end user’s system when interacted with.

item.title: CVE-2024-37053|2024-06-04T12:00:15.162Z -- MLflow -- MLflow
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data can occur in versions of the MLflow platform running version 1.1.0 or newer, enabling a maliciously uploaded scikit-learn model to run arbitrary code on an end user’s system when interacted with.

item.title: CVE-2024-37052|2024-06-04T11:59:35.035Z -- MLflow -- MLflow
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data can occur in versions of the MLflow platform running version 1.1.0 or newer, enabling a maliciously uploaded scikit-learn model to run arbitrary code on an end user’s system when interacted with.

item.title: CVE-2024-37054|2024-06-04T12:00:34.492Z -- MLflow -- MLflow
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data can occur in versions of the MLflow platform running version 0.9.0 or newer, enabling a maliciously uploaded PyFunc model to run arbitrary code on an end user’s system when interacted with.
